pages.page:
AXE PLAYS PLAY 1 | THE ARGUMENT EASY
EFFECT : KNOCK! KNOCK! KNOCK!
AXEBUG : WHO IS IT?
AXEBUG’S TURTLE : I HAVE NO IDEA!
ANT : MAYBE IT’S JUST THE WIND…
SPIDER : I’M SCARED.
AXEBUG’S TURTLE : DON’T BE A COWARD!
ANT : IT WAS NOTHING…
CATERPILLAR : DON’T BE RIDICILOUS!
AXEBUG : WHO IS THERE?
DUNG BEETLE : IT THIS IS US MASTER, OPEN THE DOOR!
LADYBUG : WHAT A STRANGE LAMP?
CATERPILLAR : PHOW!
ANT : THAT SMELL…
AXEBUG : POOH! STINKY SMELL!
AXEBUG : GET IN.
AXEBUG’S TURTLE : HELLO.
ANT : WELCOME!
CATERPILLAR : WHY ARE THEY HERE?
CATERPILLAR : I DON’T LIKE THEM.
AXEBUG : DON’T BE A COLD ONE CATERPILLAR…
DUNG BEETLE : WOW!
AXEBUG : WELL... AS YOU CAN SEE, THE ROOM IS A LITTLE CLUTTERED.
CATERPILLAR : AND WE ARE BUSY!
ANT : HEY! BE NICE…
AXEBUG : TELL ME WHAT BRINGS YOU OUT HERE?
AXEBUG’S TURTLE : YEAH, WHAT’S GOING ON?
CATERPILLAR : WHO CARES!
ANT : WHAT DID I JUST SAY!
CATERPILLAR : THEY ARE HERE NOW!
ANT : BE QUITE!
1/2 © Axebug Comics. All rights reserved 2021 Chapter 1 The Argument

AXE PLAYS PLAY 1 | THE ARGUMENT EASY
CATERPILLAR : NO!
ANT : HUSH!
CATERPILLAR : NO!
AXEBUG’S TURTLE : GUYS! LET THEM SPEAK.
SPIDER : YOU GUYS… YOU TALK SO MUCH…
DUNG BEETLE : WILL YOU ASK THE QUESTION PLEASE?
NARRATOR : UPON LISTENING THEIR ARGUMENT…
AXEBUG : HMM!
CATERPILLAR : I THINK I NOW THE ANSWER.
SPIDER : OH! SO WHAT?
AXEBUG : IT’S NEITHER FLAT NOR ROUND. THE WORLD IS A CUBE!
AXEBUG’S TURTLE : THAT’S SO FUNNY! HAH HAAAAA!
AXEBUG : WOULD YOU LIKE TO FIND THE ANSWER BY YOURSELVES?
DUNG BEETLE : WOW! LET’S TRY TO FIND THE ANSWER.
LADYBUG : I’LL FIND THE ANSWER!
AXEBUG : THIS WAY, PLEASE… I’M SURE YOU WILL ENJOY THIS JOURNEY A LOT.
AXEBUG : FOLLOW ME…
SPIDER : FOLLOW HIM.
AXEBUG’S TURTLE : HURRAY! I LOVE THIS!
CATERPILLAR : LET’S GO!
AXEBUG : I WILL SHOW YOU SOMETHING YOU HAVE NEVER SEEN BEFORE.
AXEBUG’S TURTLE : YOU ARE GOING TO BE SO SURPRISED!
SPIDER : OK. SURPRISED…
CATERPILLAR : IT’S AWESOME.
AXEBUG : OVER THERE! RIGHT BEHIND THIS DOOR…
AXEBUG : OH, FINALLY! COME ON! LET’S GO IN.
CATERPILLAR : TAA TAAAAA!
AXEBUG’S TURTLE : YES!
AXEBUG :AND HERE WE ARE. PLEASE WELCOME! ZZZ-55
2/2 © Axebug Comics. All rights reserved 2021 Chapter 1 The Argument

AXE PLAYS PLAY 2 | AXEBUG AND HIS FRIENDS EASY
DUNG BEETLE : IT LOOKS LIKE A HUGE HOUSEFLY... WHAT IS IT?
AXEBUG : IT’S A SPACESHIP.
DUNG BEETLE : HMMM.
SNAKE : WOW!
DUNG BEETLE : WHY DON’T YOU JUST TELL THE ANSWER SO THAT WE CAN MOVE ON WITH OUR LIVES?
BUTTERFLY : TELL US!
SNAIL : I WANT TO SLEEP.
AXEBUG : IF I TELL YOU THE ANSWER NOW, YOU WOULD STILL ASK FOR THE PROOF. RIGHT?
SNAKE : HE IS SO CONFUSING!
DUNG BEETLE : HMM! RIGHT…
BUTTERFLY : OKAY…
SNAIL : BUT I STILL WANT TO SLEEP.
AXEBUG : WELL… IF YOU GUYS REALLY WANT THE ANSWER, YOU WILL HAVE TO GET ON THE SPACESHIP FIRST.
BUTTERFLY : WHAT?
BEE : IS HE KIDDING?
BUTTERFLY : NO HE ISN’T.
SNAIL : LET’S GO HOME AND SLEEP.
BEE : NO! WE ARE NOT GOING HOME.
AXEBUG : YES…
AXEBUG : WHAT’S YOUR DECISION?
DUNG BEETLE : ALLRIGHT. CAN YOU PLEASE TELL US WHY?
BUTTERFLY : HE IS RIGHT MASTER.
AXEBUG : IT WILL BE A GREAT ADVENTURE! COME ON.
BUTTERFLY : I’M NOT SURE.
SNAIL : LET’S GO HOME!
BEE : ENOUGH SNAIL!
DUNG BEETLE : WOULDN’T IT BE ENOUGH IF WE JUST CLIMBED UP A TREE?
LADYBUG : EXACTLY!
1/2 © Axebug Comics. All rights reserved 2021 Chapter 1 The Argument

AXE PLAYS PLAY 2 | AXEBUG AND HIS FRIENDS EASY
BUTTERFLY : PERFECT IDEA!
SNAIL : CAN WE SLEEP THERE?
BEE : GIVE ME A BREAK!
AXEBUG : IS THIS A JOKE?
AXEBUG : PLEASE TELL ME YOU ARE KIDDING!
BUTTERFLY : ARE WE JOKING?
BEE : NOT REALLY…
DUNG BEETLE : ... EFFECT
LADYBUG : ... EFFECT
SNAKE : HE IS ANGRY…
AXEBUG : OF COURSE CLIMBING UP A TREE IS NOT ENOUGH GUYS. WE NEED TO FLY HIGHER.
AXEBUG : ... SO YOU NEED TO GET ON THIS SPACESHIP!
SNAKE : NO HIDING ANYMORE.
BUTTERLY : I GUESS WE NEED TO DO THIS GUYS.
BEE : YES, YOU ARE RIGHT.
SNAIL : I’M NOT SO SURE…
SNAKE : WELL, SURE OR NOT WE ARE DOING IT!
SNAIL : I WANT TO SLEEP!
SNAKE : SLEEP ON THE WAY!
SNAIL : HEY, THAT’S A GOOD IDEA!
DUNG BEETLE : WE LET OURSELVES IN FOR THAT… LET’S DO IT.
LADYBUG : TO TELL YOU THE TRUTH, I AM A BIT WIMPED OUT.
AXEBUG : YOU CAME ROUND AT LAST. SNAIL : FINE!
AXEBUG : NOW GO HOME AND HAVE A GOOD SLEEP.
NARRATOR : THEY HEADED TO THEIR HOUSES WITHOUT A WORD. WHATEVER WOULD HAPPEN, WOULD HAPPEN…
2/2 © Axebug Comics. All rights reserved 2021 Chapter 1 The Argument

AXE PLAYS PLAY 3 | LOST IN SPACE EASY
DUNG BEETLE : WHERE ARE WE EVEN GOING?
LADYBUG : I DON’T KNOW…
CRICKET : WE ARE LOST!
HORNET : IN THE MIDDLE OF THE NIGHT!
WORM : OK GUYS. I’M NOT HAPPY WITH THIS…
AXEBUG : CALM DOWN FELLOWS. WE WILL FIND A WAY.
DUNG BEETLE : MASTER, WE ARE IN THE MIDDLE OF ROBUG COLONY. WE DON’T HAVE OUR SPACESHIP BECAUSE BOSSROACH STOLE IT!
HORNET : WE CAN GET IT BACK!
WORM : AND HOW IS THAT GOING TO HAPPEN HORNET?
HORNET : I DON’T KNOW. BUT WE WILL FIND SOMETHING.
LADYBUG : I’M COLD!
CRICKET : DO YOU WANT A JACKET?
LADYBUG : YES.
CRICKET : WELL, THERE’S NONE! WE ARE LOST, HOW CAN WE FIND A JACKET!
AXEBUG : COOL YOUR JETS…
DUNG BEETLE : I MISS ROLLING!
LADYBUG : STOP IT!
DUNG BEETLE : WHAT?
LADYBUG : WE CAN’T LISTEN TO YOUR POOH STORIES RIGHT NOW!
WORM : YES BEETLE.
DUNG BEETLE : BUT MY STORIES ARE SO GOOD.
HORNET : YES. THEY ARE ONLY GOOD FOR YOU…
DUNG BEETLE : HEY! AXEBUG : IF WE GO THIS DIRECTION, WE MIGHT FIND SOME CRATERS AND WATER.
CRICKET : OH YES. DEFINATELY WATER. I’M THIRSTY!
LADYBUG : I’M STARVING!
DUNG BEETLE : IT’S ALWAYS A CHANCE TO….
ALL TOGETHER : STOP BEETLE!
DUNG BEETLE : FINE BY ME…
1/2 © Axebug Comics. All rights reserved 2021 Chapter 1 The Argument

AXE PLAYS PLAY 3 | LOST IN SPACE EASY
AXEBUG : I THINK WE NEED TO MOVE THIS SIDE GUYS. MAYBE WE CAN GET SOME ANSWERS.
CRICKET : WHAT IF BOSSROACH IS THERE?
WORM : WE WILL FIGHT!
LADYBUG : NO, WE WILL TALK AND FIND A WAY.
DUNG BEETLE : BUT TALKING NEVER WORKS.
LADYBUG : I’M SURE IT WILL THIS TIME. WE HAVE AXEBUG HERE.
WORM : HE IS THE WISEST IN TOWN.
CRICKET : LET’S LEAVE THE TALKING TO HIM.
AXEBUG : GUYS LET’S GO.
2/2 © Axebug Comics. All rights reserved 2021 Chapter 1 The Argument

AXE PLAYS PLAY 4 | WILD ONES EASY
WILD ANIMALS ENTERED THE ROBUG COLONY WITH A MASSIVE SPACESHIP. ALL THE ROBOTS AND ROBOTBUGS WERE VERY SURPRISED TO SEE THIS BUT THEY HAD NO CHOICE. THE WATCHMAN LOCKED THE SHIP IMMEDIETELY AND IT LANDED.
WORM : COME OUT OF THE SHIP. IN A SINGLE LINE! NOW!
WATCHMAN 1 : OUT… NOW!
SNAKE : I WONDER WHERE THEY ARE COMING FROM? WATCHMAN 2 : FROM THE EARTH OF COURSE.
SNAKE : MAYBE JUPITER SENT THEM. SENT AN EXPLOSION, REMEMBER!
SPIDER : BUT THAT WAS ONLY FOR FUN! HA HAH HAA!
WORM : IT WAS FUN…
SNAKE : MAYBE THEY’RE COMING BACK!
WORM : BOSSROACH WILL SHOW THEM NOW! HAHA HAAAAA!
MOTH : WHAT IS TAKING SO LONG? WHY ARE THEY NOT OUT YET?
WATCHMAN 1 : MAYBE THEY ARE GOING TO FIGHT US…
SNAKE : GET READY GUYS…
WORM : COME ON OUT! OR I WILL SHOOT!
LION AND TIGER COMES OUT TOGETHER WITH GROWLS
BOSSROACH : HELLO TO MY GOOD FRIENDS!
WORM : WHAT?
SNAKE : ARE THESE YOUR FRIENDS, BOSS?
MOTH : HOW COME WE DON’T KNOW.
SNAKE : BECAUSE BOSS DOESN’T TELL US MUCH.
WORM : WOW!
BOSSROACH : ENOUGH! GET THE FOOD READY. MY FRIENDS ARE HUNGRY.
MOTH : YES SIR!
SNAKE : ALL RIGHT BOSS…
WATCHMAN 1 : HE IS SO BOSSY…
WATCHMAN 2 : HE IS THE BOSS, SILLY!
WATCHMAN 1 : YEAH, YOU’RE RIGHT.
MOTH : COME ON… LET’S GET THE FOOD READY.
1/2 © Axebug Comics. All rights reserved 2021 Chapter 1 The Argument

AXE PLAYS PLAY 4 | WILD ONES EASY
BOSSROACH : WHY DID YOU ARRIVE LATE?
LION : WE HAD SOME PEOPLE COMING.
TIGER : YEAH. SATURN’S SOLDIERS TRIED TO STOP US!
BOSSROACH : HAH HAH HAAA! HOW FUNNY. THEY STILL DON’T UNDERSTAND.
LION : THEY CAN’T STOP US!
TIGER : OF COURSE.
BOSSROACH : DID YOU BRING THE DEVICES?
LION : THEY ARE IN THE SHIP. WE ARE READY.
TIGER : WHAT ARE WE STARTING WITH?
BOSSROACH : THE EARTH OF COURSE! I HATE THOSE HUMANS!
LION : WE NEED TO ACT FAST.
BOSSROACH : YOU’RE RIGHT. NO TIME TO LOOSE. EAT AND REST. THEN, WE WILL SEND THE BOMBS IN NO TIME…
MOTH : FOOD IS READY TO SERVE…
2/2 © Axebug Comics. All rights reserved 2021 Chapter 1 The Argument

AXE PLAYS PLAY 5 | MUSICAL SHOW EASY
NARRATOR : WELCOME TO THE AXE-PARTY! TONIGHT WE ARE GOING TO PERFORM A LOT OF SONGS AND DANCES. I HOPE YOU WILL HAVE A GREAT TIME!
NARRATOR : LET’S START WITH DUNG BEETLE! HE WILL SING ______________________
DUNG BEETLE SINGS HIS SONG.
NARRATOR : THANKYOU VERY MUCH FOR THIS GREAT SONG… NOW, IT IS TIME FOR A GOOD DANCE, RIGHT? PLEASE WELCOME LADYBUG AND HER FRIENDS! LADYBUG AND HER CREW DANCES TO ________________________
NARRATOR : ANOTHER CLAP FOR THE LOVELY GROUP! NOW, LET’S HEAR THE BUTTERFLY!
BUTTERFLY SINGS ________________________________
NARRATOR : THANKYOU FOR THIS AMAZING SONG. YOU WERE GREAT! IT IS HORNET AND HIS BEES COMING NEXT WITH THEIR LOVELY SONG _______________________ _____________
HORNET AND BEES SING THEIR SONG.
NARRATOR : THANKYOU FOR THE CLAPS. AS YOU KNOW, OUR SHOW IS COMING TO AN END. BUT, BEFORE WE LEAVE WE HAVE ANOTHER GROUP. OUR WISEST GREAT MASTER WITH HIS FRIENDS TURTLE AND CATERPILLAR. PLEASE WELCOME, AXEBUG!
AXEBUG SINGS AND DANCES WITH CATERPILLAR AND TURTLE.
NARRATOR : THANKYOU ALL FOR SHOWING UP TODAY. OUR SHOW ENDS WITH THIS GREAT SONG. LET’S SING TOGETHER ________________________________________
1/1 © Axebug Comics. All rights reserved 2021 Chapter 1 The Argument
